caption:
Table 1: ImageNet top-1 accuracy of different operator combinations. T, M, and 
C refer to transformer block, MLP-Mixer block, and Depthwise Convolution 
block respectively. Different block numbers are chosen so that their computations 
are comparable.

Table 2: UniNet-B0 architecture. GOP and 
DSM represent General Operators and down-
sampling module respectively. DWConv and SA 
are described in Section 3.2.

Table 3: Performance of Top-5 
models after fully training. D 
and A are short for DWConv and 
SA respectively.

Table 4: UniNet performance on Ima-
geNet. All UniNet models are trained 
on the ImageNet-1K dataset with 
1.28M images. C, T, and H denote con-
volution, transformer, and hybrid ar-
chitecture respectively.

Table 5: Performance on ImageNet 
with ImageNet-21K pre-train. All 
models are pre-trained on ImageNet-
21K and finetuned on ImageNet-1K.

Table 6: Comparison with previous ef-
ficient architectures. UniNet is trained 
with knowledge distillation for a more 
fair comparison.

Table 7: Object detection, instance segmentation, and semantic segmentation 
performance on the COCO val2017 and ADE20K val set. All UniNet models are 
pre-trained on the ImageNet-1K dataset.

Table 8: Performance on the COCO val2017 with various detection frameworks. 
The AP@box is reported.
